title: Rito plz unban me
body: RIOT PLZ I GOT BANNED BECAUSE I HAD A SUPPORT WHO WAS NOT BIENG A SUPPORT AND TASKING CS AND KILLS PLZ UNBAN MY ACCOUNT I MISS IT ALREADY :(

replies.body: I highly doubt that is the reason you were banned, but you are welcome to post your chat logs if you feel it was unjustified.

I was in the game he was raging and telling the Jax to kill himself and saying that he shouldn't have been conceived though he probably didn't use smart words like that but anyway, this man is on my friends list and clearly suffers from Dunning Kruger syndrome he is constantly blaming other people for his mistakes and proceeds to go on autopilot and feed whist spending more time typing than playing, he now plays on his/mine friends account Mechy80 and continues his toxic ways. His first ban lasted for 2 weeks and it was because he was flaming his team for no help because he got beat by a Soraka building full ad in the bottom lane. But anyway here are the chat logs typed out because I can't post images.

Permanently Banned
Eazey17
Because a player-triggered review found in your in-game comms extremely inflammatory and offensive, your account's been permanently suspended.

You are among 0.006% of Leagues players negative enough to be permanently banned.

Other players judged your comms to be far below the standards of the League community. The vast majority of players agree that while League's an intense, competitive game, everyone deserves respect on the Rift.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

YOUR CHAT LOGS
Game 1
Eazey17: I fucking will
Eazey17: kys
Eazey17: fucking kys
Eazey17: stop being toxic u little %%%%
Eazey17: your cancer %%%%
Eazey17: fuck off my kills
Eazey17: kys
Eazey17: your a %%%% WE ALL REPROTING U SO GET READY TO KYS

then it continues but he still believes till this day that it was all the Jax's and his friends fault for receiving a ban. He needs to understand that it is his own fault and stop blaming everyone for the problems that he makes for himself. If someone can supply me with a way to upload an image I will post a screenshot of the chat logs.

Edit: http://imgur.com/a/Ca7e1  I uploaded it to imgur.
